name: Workning on The Moon
description:
Scan for resources hidden in the moon, and extract them using Re-EX technology. Always check off-board temperature, too low or high temp causes your organism to take a damage. It is better to stay in the middle of light and shadow.

Game for Lunar gamejam.

Controls:

W, S, A, D or arrow keys - drive the car

1 -buy and place scanner

2, 3, 4, 5 - buy and place specific extractor

Space - buy and use medicine package

R - restart game when finished

Game can be played only on keyboard but you also can use mouse to click on buttons too.

Made in Godot engine. Krita used for images. Audacity for audio cropping. Audio from freesound.com (public domain sources).
